documents.document: I think I’ve earned this evening’s wine after a morning creating a bug repro *and* then fixing part of the bug this afternoon. 🐜🍷
@jaysteruk @ashleytwo I chose to not get into the super nitty gritty, as otherwise my daily commute is three cities.
@ashleytwo @jaysteruk 6. And Seattle. Now I’m done.
@ashleytwo @jaysteruk Oh wait, 5. Those two, plus NYC, Berlin and Hamburg.
@ashleytwo @jaysteruk Off the top of my head I’ve done 4 cities and 3 countries. 😬
@jaysteruk Definitely way more than me!
So just run out the clock on your tenure until you get booted out? https://t.co/Emh1t9wwt3
@gpb1979 @bobbert_ Gary, l’homme de pleusiers langues.
@smalltown2k I’d have given it 7/10. Also I didn’t pay as it was a suprise for my birthday in 2017.
@smalltown2k Aww, I thought it was quite fun.
@JamesCoyne Oh, I thought it was an earring.
@bobbert_ @gpb1979 «Boîte de cerveau» 🤪

@tweeting_keith Is everything on fire today in Manchester?
@JamieBGall Yeah that bit was interesting as they’re right. It’s not the main focus of the film.
@JamieBGall It not being scary probably explains why I like it. I don’t really like scary films.
@JamieBGall Ok fair. I think I’m kinda both as I don’t find it _scary_ either. But I really like it.
@JamieBGall I’ll let you know if I find that an insult or not.
@GeneticJen I feel that maybe several F1 games might have this vibe 🤪
@JamieBGall That’s my commute home sorted then.

@adebradley Yes.

@adebradley Let me have nice childish things.

@odekul I’m not. I was stood outside Warren Street tube station on my way to get to the rally point for the Pride In London parade.
@rudemrlang Nah they were all on my tube instead.
@smalltown2k I do have mad skills...oh, languages.
@techpractical Ive gotten to a point with French where I try and listen to conversations tourists have on the tube, but they speak really fast so it’s still pretty difficult.

@techpractical Nein. My German’s a lot less great as I only use it in Duolingo (plus holiday in Berlin for a few days last April) and I never did it in school. French is just expanding on what I did at GCSE donc c’est plus super.
@techpractical I use it so much and have learned so much from it I paid the £50 annual membership for it last year and renewed it the other week.
@techpractical I do two Frenches and two Germans a day. Sometimes I also do two Japanese, but that’s a lot harder and I’m on my second break from that at the moment.
@TylerRJ_ Better than a number two.
